流.definition: to flow; to disseminate; to circulate or spread; to move or drift; to degenerate; to banish or send into exile; stream of water or sth resembling one; class, rate or grade

流亡.definition: to force into exile; to be exiled; in exile

流佈.definition: to spread; to circulate; to disseminate

流俗.definition: prevalent fashion (often used pejoratively); vulgar customs

流傳.definition: to spread; to circulate; to hand down

流光溢彩.definition: lit. flowing light and overflowing color; brilliant lights and vibrant colors (idiom)

流入.definition: to flow into; to drift into; influx; inflow

流出.definition: to flow out; to disgorge; to effuse

流動.definition: to flow; to circulate; to go from place to place; to be mobile; (of assets) liquid

流動性.definition: flowing; shifting; fluidity; mobility; liquidity (of funds)

流動性大沙漠.pinyin: liu2 dong4 xing4 da4 sha1 mo4

流向.definition: direction of a current; direction of flow; to flow toward

流失.definition: (of soil etc) to wash away; to be eroded; (fig.) (of talented staff, followers of a religious faith, investment funds etc) to go elsewhere; to fail to be retained

流宕忘反.definition: to stray and forget to return

流布.definition: to spread; to circulate; to disseminate

流年.definition: fleeting time; horoscope for the year

流年不利.definition: the year's horoscope augurs ill (idiom); an unlucky year

流拍.definition: (of an item) to fail to sell at an auction

流放.definition: to exile; to banish; to deport; to float (logs) downstream

流星.definition: meteor; shooting star; meteor hammer (abbr. for 流星錘|流星锤[liu2 xing1 chui2])

流星趕月.definition: lit. a meteor catching up with the moon; swift action (idiom)

流星錘.definition: meteor hammer (ancient weapon consisting of two iron balls connected by a chain)

流暢.definition: flowing (of speech, writing); fluent; smooth and easy

流水不腐，戶樞不蠹.pinyin: liu2 shui3 bu4 fu3 , hu4 shu1 bu4 du4
流水不腐，戶樞不蠹.definition: lit. flowing water does not rot, nor a door-hinge rust (idiom); fig. constant activity prevents decay

流水席.definition: banquet where guests arrive at various times and are served with food as they arrive

流水帳.definition: variant of 流水賬|流水账[liu2 shui3 zhang4]

流沙.definition: quicksand; (patisserie) (usu. attributive) semi-liquid filling (typically custard); lava

流沙包.definition: salted egg custard bun; lava bun (steamed bun with a sweet runny egg custard filling, a popular dim sum)

流浪.definition: to drift about; to wander; to roam; nomadic; homeless; unsettled (e.g. population); vagrant

流球.definition: variant of 琉球[Liu2 qiu2], Ryūkyū, e.g. the Ryūkyū Islands 琉球群島|琉球群岛[Liu2 qiu2 Qun2 dao3] stretching from Japan to Taiwan

流球群島.definition: the Ryukyu or Luchu Islands (including Okinawa)

流理台.definition: kitchen counter (generally including sink, food preparation area and gas range) (Tw)

流產.definition: to have a miscarriage; (fig.) to fail; to fall through

流眄.definition: to ogle; to glance in a shifty manner

流程.definition: course; stream; sequence of processes; work flow in manufacturing

流竄.definition: to roam all over the place; to go into every nook and corner; to infiltrate; (of criminals, enemies etc) to be on the run; to flee and try to hide

流紋岩.definition: rhyolite (extrusive igneous rock, chemically equivalent to granite)

流腦.definition: epidemic cerebrospinal meningitis (abbr. for 流行性腦膜炎|流行性脑膜炎[liu2 xing2 xing4 nao3 mo2 yan2])

流芳百世.definition: (of one's name, reputation etc) to be immortalized (idiom); to leave a mark for generations to come

流落.definition: to wander about destitute; to be stranded

流蕩.definition: to float; to tramp; to rove

流行.definition: (of a contagious disease etc) to spread; to propagate; (of a style of clothing, song etc) popular; fashionable

流行性.definition: qualities that make sth popular or fashionable; (of a disease) epidemic

流言蜚語.definition: rumors and slanders (idiom); gossip; lies and slanders

流調.definition: epidemiological survey (abbr. for 流行病學調查|流行病学调查[liu2 xing2 bing4 xue2 diao4 cha2])

流變.definition: to flow and change; development and change (of society)

流輩.definition: a contemporary; similar class of people

流轉.definition: to be on the move; to roam or wander; to circulate (of goods or capital)

流通.definition: to circulate; to distribute; circulation; distribution

流連.definition: to loiter (i.e. reluctant to leave); to linger on

流連忘返.definition: to linger; to remain enjoying oneself and forget to go home

流量.definition: flow rate; throughput of passengers; volume of traffic; (hydrology) discharge; data traffic; network traffic; website traffic; mobile data

流量明星.definition: (neologism c. 2014) celebrity with a huge, devoted fan base; celebrity with a huge following on social media

流離.definition: homeless and miserable; forced to leave home and wander from place to place; to live as a refugee

流離失所.definition: destitute and homeless (idiom); forced from one's home and wandering about; displaced

流離遇合.definition: to reunite after being homeless refugees

流離顛沛.definition: destitute and homeless (idiom); displaced and without means

流露.definition: to reveal (indirectly, implicitly); to show (interest, contempt etc) by means of one's actions, tone of voice etc

流韻.definition: musical sound; flowing rhythm (of poetry); cadence

流鼻血.definition: to bleed from the nose; (fig.) to be sexually aroused
